comments: Amazing. Tests were worth like 30 points but the homework for them was like 200, and you have 3 tries to do it. Everything is covered in lectures but you can skip if you want and only show up on test day. He does do a review the day before though. Definitely would recommend for the science credit, plus the lab is super easy too.

comments: Probably the only class I\'ve ever heard of where going to class would actually hurt you. Lectures are so confusing and poorly organized that you don\'t know what he\'s saying and he\'ll probably explain the concept incorrectly. Really tries, but just isn\'t good at teaching. Curves A TON because the class average on every test was B but most got As.

comments: James Lauroesch\'s area of expertise is Astronomy, and this was his second time ever teaching PHYS299. His first time was a failure according to other ratings on this site, but his second time was pretty awful too. The man actually didn\'t know how to do the problems and would just skip it, but it would still be on the test... Worst professor ever.

comments: I never learned one thing from this class. The only thing that helped me pass was taking pages full of notes that he\'ll let you use on the exams. Tests are usually extremely difficult but he does curve. You won\'t have a clue as to what grade you have in the class until he posts it as a final grade.

comments: A really smart and good guy. Horrendous professor. Lectures are usually unrelated to exams. Does not follow the syllabus in any way. Homework is online and he posts it very sporadically, making it hard to complete before they\'re due. Assignments are rough w easily over 150 questions each and have videos to watch before answering. He does curve

comments: He\'s a terrible lecturer. His points are unclear, he\'s inarticulate, and most of his anecdotes are distracting and irrelevant. He posts all of his lectures online, so attendance is not mandatory. He does give extra credit. His syllabus and exams were full of typos. He takes forever to post exam grades and reply to emails. I would not recommend him.
